channel.title: [Suggestion] "Show new replies to your posts" Multi-forum integration
channel.description: I have a suggestion, I love the "show new replies to your posts" button up there, I was wondering if there was a way where we could make the game dev, MITB and all the other forums I might post on, show up at once, this would help so you would not have to open all the links, just go on one forum.

item.title: [Suggestion] "Show new replies to your posts" Multi-forum integration
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

If you are a web devo, Taharok stated above you can make your own so we can use it

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] "Show new replies to your posts" Multi-forum integration
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This has been suggested before. It comes down to me getting around to updating the mod, which I am mostly disinclined to do. I’ve been asked by dozens of people on simplemachines to update it to include this feature, among other features and such. It’s simply not something I’m up to doing right now, nor have time to do.

Mopar probably could hack together a simple solution, but that’s up to him. If I were to update it, I would specifically do it properly, meaning it would take longer (and would have a changed recent posts template for each subforum, etc). Eh, yeah.

Though, if someone else wants to integrate it into the mod, I’m sure that will be entirely welcome. I can’t even find the original mod on simplemachines.org anymore (so many mods were made to replace it, it’s kinda nuts. :P) But yeah, that’s that.

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] "Show new replies to your posts" Multi-forum integration
